name: Kathairein Within
description:
The Story

Play as Kathairein Sloane, a veteran combat medic, haunted by her own survivor's guilt. Join her as she struggles to come to terms with her past mistakes and help her fight to forgive herself. 

Controls

KBM / XBox

  • WASD / Left Joystick - Movement
  • Shift / Left Joystick - Run
  • Space / Left Trigger or Right Trigger - Jump
  • E / B - Pick up

Installation Instructions

1. Download the game files
2. Run the Kathairein Within.exe
3. Plug in a controller (Recommended)

Disclaimer!

If you die in any of the "Hallway Levels", please restart the game.
The reason being, a few things like character speed and camera position not working as intended when entering the next level.
